about_the_game:
Kinetic visual novel. (Only Main heroine is fully voice-acted.)

The year is 2052. In a dystopian future where no one goes outside. Birth rate at an all time low, suicide rate at an all time high.

On the Rings of Atlantis, a ring of artificial islands built to withstand the rising sea level, a degenerate loner attempts to revive a stolen android. The attempt to jailbreak fails at first, until it didn't. To his surprise she wakes up. Playful, poetic, philosophical, and perhaps even a little possessive.

Beneath her charismatic demeanor she hides a dark secret.

Unravel the city together with her.

Nothing in the world compares to the real thing.



The frequent sexual content disclaimer is off, I am trying to get the ratings removed, there is no sex in here, so if you're here for tits and tits only, you might want to reconsider reading it.

content_descriptors.notes: Mention of self-harm. Mention of nudity. Mention of content that is sexual but no explicit sexual scenes.

detailed_description:
Kinetic visual novel. (Only Main heroine is fully voice-acted.)

The year is 2052. In a dystopian future where no one goes outside. Birth rate at an all time low, suicide rate at an all time high.

On the Rings of Atlantis, a ring of artificial islands built to withstand the rising sea level, a degenerate loner attempts to revive a stolen android. The attempt to jailbreak fails at first, until it didn't. To his surprise she wakes up. Playful, poetic, philosophical, and perhaps even a little possessive.

Beneath her charismatic demeanor she hides a dark secret.

Unravel the city together with her.

Nothing in the world compares to the real thing.



The frequent sexual content disclaimer is off, I am trying to get the ratings removed, there is no sex in here, so if you're here for tits and tits only, you might want to reconsider reading it.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: The Cyber Masquerade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher.
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
